value:
$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Hey! It's almost time for the bridal
festival. Aren't you going to get ready
for the tournament?$k$p$WmMPID_スー,ch02_16_Sue_F_Normal,Face|How am I supposed to fight in
something that formal? I prefer
clothes I can move around in.$k$pThe rules don't require us to wear
anything specific. So why do I see
so many frilly outfits like yours?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Well, I guess most girls want to feel
pretty on their big day? Appearances
are important too, you know!$k$p$WmMPID_スー,ch02_16_Sue_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... The people of the plains have
always preferred practical attire. I'm
still not sure about all this...gaudiness.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|$Fi1500|Cecilia! Cecilia, did you hear?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|What's wrong, Lilina? Slow down
and take a deep breath.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|The prize for the bridal-festival
tournament has been announced!
It's... It's...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|A special ceremony...but only if you
find the bridal bouquet and best
everyone else in combat. Right?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Yes, and Roy's going to be the last
one standing. I just know it!$k$pAnd that means... He'll have to
choose someone to join him for the
ceremony...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|Ah, so that's what's driven you into
such a tizzy.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|And to make matters worse, rumor
has it he already has his eye on
someone. Oh, who could it be?$k$pWe've known each other for so long,
but we've never talked about this sort
of thing...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|If you're that concerned about it, why
not win the bouquet yourself?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Huh?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|The victor can ask anyone they wish
to accompany them, right? So win
and ask him yourself.$k$pAt the very least, you won't have to
fret about him asking someone else.$k$pThat said, please remember that even
if he does accept, this festival is just
for fun.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Yes, of course! Oh, Cecilia, you're the
best teacher I could ever ask for.
Thank you!$k$pJust watch! I'm going to win this
tournament no matter what!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_花嫁ララム,ch02_22_Lalum_F_Wedding22,Face|A twist here, a twirl there...and a final
flourish to top it all off. All right, my
dancing's never looked better!$k$pI'm gonna get that bouquet and
make Lord Roy my partner in
the victory celebration!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|You're certainly in high spirits. It
seems Lilina has some competition!
Are you after Roy too, Sophia?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Wedding22,Face|I'm happy...just to have worn such
a pretty outfit. I don't mind...not
having a ceremony...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_花嫁ララム,ch02_22_Lalum_F_Wedding22,Face|Lord Roy, where did you run off
to? Sheesh, and I was just getting
warmed up. This is the best part!$k$p$Sbs150|
